definition: New Fourth Army Incident of 1940, involving fighting between the Nationalists and Communists
abbr. for Anhui Province 安徽省[An1 hui1 Sheng3]
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: Southern anhui incident, the reconstruction of the new fourth army headquarters.
sentences.chinese: “皖南事變”後，新四軍重建軍部。
